mapper.select: select ss.stu_id as stuId,ss.pk_teacher_id as teaId,ss.stu_name as stuName, 0 as checked,now() as createTime,0 as is_deleted from school_student ss left join school_sign_history ssh on ssh.pk_stu_id!=ss.stu_id and datediff(ssh.sign_history_create,now())=0 left join school_leave_history slh on ss.stu_id!=slh.pk_stu_id and slh.end_time>now() and now()>slh.start_time where ss.is_deleted=0 and slh.is_success=1 and slh.is_deleted=0
